title: EkAmranAtham bhajEham
sahitya:
EkAmranAtham bhajEham EkAnEka phalapradam shrI


anupallavi

 OmkAra rUpam shivam OSadhi mUlam varam kAlakAlam haram 
karma bhEda haram jnAna rUpa sutam guruguhanutam


caraNam   pancAkSara mantra rUpam prasanna rUpam prapancAtIta sadyOjAtAdi pancamukham 
sumukham prakaTita kAmakOTi pIThasthitam prasiddha mUkAdinuta kAmAkSI sahitam
